title: Minimum two surface parking spaces for the first 100 parking spaces and one parking space for next 200 parking spaces or part thereof shall be provided near entrance for the Differently abled persons with maximum travel distance of 30 m from building entrance
clause_text: Minimum two surface parking spaces for the first 100 parking spaces and one parking space for next 200 parking spaces or part thereof shall be provided near entrance for the Differently abled persons with maximum travel distance of 30 m from building entrance.
